page.title: 05ENTERTAINMENT
page.content: A review of the Brookmans Park area produced some disappointing results for the week July 4th-11th. The entertainments were all locally advertised and were as follows: a barbeque,acoffee morning,a school fete and akeep fit class. As well as these as permanent attractions in the area are the golf course the park and a number of pleasant public houses. For amore varied programme of events one has to travel further afield to places such as Potters Bar and Hatfield and, of course London is in reach. Our researchers who were all 14 years old and do not live in the Brookmans Park area but in Cheshunt which is more built up felt that there were not enough entertainments there which would appeal to their age group and thought it unlikely they wouldbe able to afford to travel for a better time.
